holland.title: Holland Test (RIASEC)
holland.subtitle: Discover Your Career Interests
holland.overview: The Holland Test, also known as the RIASEC Interest Inventory, is a comprehensive career assessment tool developed by psychologist John L. Holland. This scientifically validated test helps you understand your vocational interests and identifies career paths that align with your natural preferences and personality.

whatItMeasures.title: What This Test Measures
whatItMeasures.description: The Holland Test evaluates your interests across six personality types, known as the RIASEC model:
whatItMeasures.realistic: Realistic (R): Practical, hands-on problem solvers who enjoy working with tools, machines, and physical tasks.
whatItMeasures.investigative: Investigative (I): Analytical thinkers who love research, inquiry, and solving complex problems.
whatItMeasures.artistic: Artistic (A): Creative individuals who express themselves through art, music, writing, or design.
whatItMeasures.social: Social (S): People-oriented helpers who enjoy teaching, counseling, and supporting others.
whatItMeasures.enterprising: Enterprising (E): Leaders and persuaders who thrive in business, sales, and entrepreneurial roles.
whatItMeasures.conventional: Conventional (C): Organized detail-oriented individuals who excel at data management and structured tasks.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: Answer 60 questions honestly about activities you enjoy or would like to do.
howItWorks.step2: Rate your interest level in various work-related tasks and scenarios.
howItWorks.step3: Receive your personalized RIASEC profile showing your top interest areas.
howItWorks.step4: Explore career matches tailored to your unique interest profile.

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.intro: To get the most accurate results:
instructions.point1: Set aside 15-20 minutes in a quiet environment.
instructions.point2: Answer honestly based on what you genuinely enjoy, not what others expect.
instructions.point3: Don't overthink your answers—your first instinct is usually correct.
instructions.point4: Complete all sections for comprehensive results.
instructions.point5: You can save your progress and return later if needed.

resultsInfo.title: What You'll Learn
resultsInfo.point1: Your top three Holland Code types (e.g., IAS, RIE)
resultsInfo.point2: Detailed breakdown of your interest scores across all six categories
resultsInfo.point3: Personalized career recommendations matched to your profile
resultsInfo.point4: Insights into work environments where you'll thrive
resultsInfo.point5: Understanding of your natural strengths and preferences

education.collegesDesc: Technical colleges offer hands-on, applied education focused on specific skills and technologies.
education.universitiesDesc: Universities provide comprehensive education with research opportunities and theoretical foundations.
education.coursesDesc: Online courses provide flexible learning opportunities for skill development and career transitions.
education.entSystemDesc: The Unified National Testing (ENT) determines university admission. Higher ENT scores qualify for government grants and prestigious programs.
education.focusDesc: Hands-on training, industry partnerships, direct employment
education.specializationsDesc: Browse specializations and universities offering programs in this field
education.untSystemDesc: The Unified National Testing (UNT) determines university admission. Higher UNT scores qualify for government grants and prestigious programs.
education.untTip1: Focus on math, physics, and English for technical specialties
education.untTip2: Practice with past UNT exams and mock tests
education.untTip3: Consider preparatory courses for better results
education.untTip4: Higher scores unlock better scholarship opportunities
education.untPointsDesc: UNT point requirements by year and grant type
education.generalGrantDesc: Standard government scholarships available to all students
education.aulGrantDesc: Special scholarships for students from rural areas with lower point requirements
education.untTrendNote: Upward trends indicate increased competition; downward trends indicate more accessibility
education.entTip1: Focus on math, physics, and English for technical specialties
education.entTip2: Practice with past ENT exams and mock tests
education.entTip3: Consider preparatory courses for better results
education.entTip4: Higher scores unlock better scholarship opportunities

education.changeTip5: Seek entry-level positions or internships to gain experience

education.studentTip5: Attend career fairs and networking events
education.tip1: Research various educational paths to find the best fit

archetypes.riasecDesc: Six interest areas describing work activities and environments
archetypes.skillsDesc: Key skill areas required for this profession
archetypes.personalityDesc: Big Five personality dimensions aligned with this career
archetypes.workValuesDesc: Values typically important in this profession
archetypes.riasecDescription: This profession aligns with specific interest areas based on the Holland Codes (RIASEC) model. Understanding these interests helps you determine if this career matches your preferences and work style.
archetypes.realisticDesc: Practical, hands-on work with tools, machines, and outdoor activities
archetypes.investigativeDesc: Analytical work, research, and problem-solving with data
archetypes.artisticDesc: Creative work, self-expression, and aesthetic activities
archetypes.socialDesc: Helping others, teaching, and collaborative work
archetypes.conventionalDesc: Organized work with data, records, and established procedures

market.marketOverviewDesc: Current market conditions and outlook for this profession

market.salaryNote: Salaries vary based on experience, location, company size, and specific skills. These ranges represent typical compensation in the current market.
market.industrySectorsDesc: Key industries actively hiring for this profession

market.appTip1: Tailor your resume and cover letter for each application
market.appTip2: Highlight relevant projects and quantifiable achievements
market.appTip3: Prepare thoroughly for technical and behavioral interviews
market.appTip4: Network actively on LinkedIn and professional forums
market.appTip5: Follow up with recruiters and hiring managers

market.devTip2: Stay updated with latest industry trends and technologies

market.devTip5: Contribute to open-source projects or community initiatives

market.insight3: Geographic mobility can significantly impact earning potential - consider relocating to high-demand areas
market.insight4: Salary growth is typically strong with experience - senior professionals can earn 3-4x entry-level compensation
